itemInfo.itemDesc: A material used in 2nd-grade armor upgrade.\n-Obtainable from: Refinery, through crafting.

item.name: Bronze Ingot
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Copper and Tin together. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Green Crystal
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Rough Green Crystals found near Rhutum Outstation.

item.name: Spirit's Leaf
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering that can be employed to modify other materials using Alchemy. Spirit's Leaf requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: This alchemical ingredient can be obtained by Lumbering trees, but only rarely.

item.name: Legendary Beast's Blood
item.desc: A Processed reagent capable of changing the form of other materials through Alchemy.\n- How to Obtain: It can be refined by mixing alchemical ingredients with blood through Alchemy.

item.name: Black Stone Powder
item.desc: A basic ingredient used in Crafting.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained at a Refinery through Crafting.

item.name: Agerian Shoes of Intimidation
item.desc: Energy of intimidation is contained within this Agerian Shoes\n- Equipping 2 or more parts will trigger the set effect\n- Restore Max Durability : Agerian Shoes of Duress, Agerian Shoes
